title: Commission a New Asset
description: A new conveyor belt system has been installed. A commissioning engineer must run it through a series of tests before it can be handed over to operations.

tasks.description: Retrieve the commissioning test plan for the conveyor system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the list of required tests, such as 'Belt Tracking Test' and 'Emergency Stop Test'.

tasks.description: Execute each test and record the pass/fail result in the commissioning system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer performs the tests and logs the results. One test ('Vibration Check') fails.

tasks.description: Create a punch list item for the failed test and assign it to the construction contractor to fix.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new punch list item detailing the failure and assigns it to the responsible party.
